title: Integrate error suggestions into pre-execution gate
description: Update pre-execution.md gate to call suggest-prevention.md command and include error warnings in the info section of gate results. This provides proactive error prevention before task execution.
notes: Integrated error prevention into pre-execution.md gate by adding 6th check (Error Prevention Check - INFO level). Gate now calls suggest-prevention.md command, matches task keywords against error catalog, and displays top error warnings in info section with severity, warning message, pre-checks, patterns, and recurrence count. Added example showing error prevention warnings in gate results.
